objects.text:
• Ultra-soft, breathable cotton blend
• Sleek, modern fit design
• Durable, color-retaining fabric
• Versatile for any occasion

product_details.name: Premium Classic Crew Neck T-Shirt | Ultimate Comfort & Style
product_details.description:
• Ultra-soft, breathable cotton blend fabric for all-day comfort
• Sleek, modern fit with perfect length and shoulder proportions
• Durable black fabric retains color after multiple washes
• Versatile crew neck design suitable for any occasion
• Athletic cut showcases natural body contours
• High-quality stitching for enhanced durability
• Perfect for layering or wearing as a standalone piece
• Available in various sizes for optimal fit
• Easy-care machine washable material
• Ideal for casual wear, workouts, or smart-casual styling

banner_details:
This banner is a bold promotional display with a modern, grid-based dark-toned design. On the left half, a dark grey and black background features subtle geometric grid lines and circular overlays. Prominently displayed at the top are two stacked white headline text elements ("heading_1" and "heading_2") using a large, bold sans-serif font. Below them, two orange promotional subheadings ("tagline_1" and "tagline_2") emphasize an offer. The middle section lists product highlights in bullet points within "description", aligned to the left in clean white text. At the bottom left, a large white price is shown through "price", paired with a rectangular orange call-to-action button ("cta_background" and "cta") labeled in white. On the right, a semi-cropped male model wearing a black T-shirt ("product_image") adds visual appeal, centered over a circular accent. The overall theme is sleek, stylish, and value-driven.

**Color Palette:**
- Black: #0D0D0D
- Charcoal: #212121
- Deep Gray: #303030
- White: #FFFFFF
- Accent Orange: #FF5722
product_color: The product image features a sleek black t-shirt worn by a model, where the dominant color is a deep matte black (#000000). This black gives a sophisticated and minimalistic look, ideal for a modern and masculine advertisement banner. The skin tone of the model provides a natural contrast using light beige and peach hues (#F5CBA7, #FFDFC4), creating a strong visual separation and enhancing the visibility of the t-shirt. His blue eyes (#4682B4) subtly add a cool accent to the overall warm composition. The colors are well-blended with soft transitions, while black remains the highlight, making the product the focal point.
